mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM `tb_project` WHERE 1 = 1
AND `name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
ORDER BY `id` DESC

SELECT p.`id`, p.`name`, p.`content`, p.`user_id` AS userId, p.`start_dt` AS startDate, p.`end_dt` AS endDate, p.`updated`, p.`created`, u.name AS writer FROM `tb_project` p, tb_user u
WHERE p.user_id = u.id AND p.`id` = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `tb_project`( `id`, `name`, `content`, `user_id`, `start_dt`, `end_dt`, `updated`, `created` ) VALUES( NULL, #{name}, #{content}, #{userId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, NOW(), NOW() )
